segments.text: I see the adult woman facing away from the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on, filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a shame; the kitchen will be soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get wet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her not realizing yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, looking left, the upper cabinet is ajar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, tempting the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing higher on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks unsteady, ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in his grasp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sneaky adventure could turn disastrous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside remains serene, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR
